reporter_caption.center: HUNTERDON COUNTY NATIONAL BANK v. PACKER, 122 N.J.L. 377 (1939)

caption.center: THE HUNTERDON COUNTY NATIONAL BANK OF FLEMINGTON, RESPONDENT, v. JOHN P.

opinion.posture: On appeal from the Supreme Court, whose opinion is reported in121 N.J.L. 24.Page 378
opinion.attorneys:
For the respondent, George K. Large and Herr Fisher.
For the appellants, Harry Krieger.
opinion.opinion_text:
The judgment under review herein should be affirmed, for the reasons expressed in the opinion delivered by Mr. Justice Case in the Supreme Court.
For affirmance — THE CHANCELLOR, CHIEF JUSTICE, PARKER, BODINE, HEHER, PERSKIE, PORTER, HETFIELD, DEAR, WELLS, WOLFSKEIL, RAFFERTY, JJ. 12.
For reversal — None.
